home.title: Open Source Anxiety Toolkit
home.description: Community-built tools for anxiety relief including breathing techniques, grounding, and muscle relaxation.

breathing.title: 2-Minute Breathing Exercise
breathing.description: Free guided breathing exercise using 4:6 breathing pattern. Activates parasympathetic nervous system to reduce anxiety and stress naturally.

grounding.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
grounding.description: Free grounding exercise using your 5 senses to calm anxiety and panic. Evidence-based technique for immediate stress relief.

guidedBreathing.title: Guided Breathing Exercise
guidedBreathing.description: Extended guided breathing exercises with gentle guidance. 5-10 minute sessions for deeper relaxation and anxiety management.

progressiveMuscleRelaxation.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressiveMuscleRelaxation.description: Free guided muscle relaxation exercise. Release physical tension and anxiety through systematic muscle relaxation techniques.

peacefulVisualization.title: Peaceful Visualization
peacefulVisualization.description: Guided visualization exercises for anxiety relief. Journey to calming places in your mind for stress reduction and relaxation.

thoughtLabeling.title: Thought Labeling
thoughtLabeling.description: Interactive anxiety thought categorization tool. Identify and label anxious thoughts to reduce their emotional impact.

stressReliefBubbles.title: Stress Relief Bubbles - Interactive Game
stressReliefBubbles.description: Interactive bubble popping game for stress relief and anxiety management. Satisfying sensory experience for tension release.

fidgetSpinner.title: Online Fidget Spinner - Calming Motion for Restless Energy
fidgetSpinner.description: Minimal virtual fidget spinner with realistic momentum. Drag to spin, release to settle, and give restless hands a steady outlet.

soundTherapy.title: Sound Therapy - Healing Frequencies for Anxiety
soundTherapy.description: Free sound therapy with healing frequencies and binaural beats. Deep relaxation audio for anxiety and stress relief.

stressBall.title: Interactive Stress Ball - Drag & Throw for Anxiety Relief
stressBall.description: Interactive virtual stress ball game. Drag, throw, and bounce for immediate stress relief and anxiety management. Free therapeutic tool.

superheroBreathing.title: Superhero Breathing - Kid-Friendly Anxiety Exercise
superheroBreathing.description: Fun, kid-friendly breathing exercise with superhero theme. Help children calm down and manage anxiety with engaging breathing techniques designed for kids.

scavengerHuntGrounding.title: 5 Senses Scavenger Hunt - Kid-Friendly Grounding Game
scavengerHuntGrounding.description: Fun interactive scavenger hunt game for kids using all 5 senses. Help children ground themselves and manage anxiety through playful exploration.

calmDownJar.title: Calm Down Jar - Visual Meditation Timer for Kids
calmDownJar.description: Interactive calm down jar with animated glitter for children. Watch the glitter settle to practice patience and find calm. Kid-friendly anxiety management tool.

worryMonster.title: Worry Monster - CBT Tool for Kids to Externalize Anxious Thoughts
worryMonster.description: Interactive Worry Monster tool for children. Write down worries and feed them to a friendly monster. Helps kids externalize anxious thoughts using CBT techniques. Kid-friendly anxiety management.

magicBubbleBreathing.title: Magic Bubble Breathing - Interactive Visual Breathing Exercise for Kids
magicBubbleBreathing.description: Interactive bubble breathing visualization for children. Watch a colorful bubble grow and shrink with your breath. Visual breathing aid that makes breathing exercises fun and engaging for kids. Kid-friendly anxiety management tool.

teensBodyScan.title: Body Scan for Teens - Mindfulness Body Awareness Exercise
teensBodyScan.description: Gentle body scan exercise for teenagers. Systematic body awareness practice to notice tension and release physical stress. Mindfulness technique adapted for adolescent anxiety. Teen-friendly anxiety management tool.

futureWorryTime.title: Future Worry Time - Scheduled Worry Time CBT Technique for Teens
futureWorryTime.description: Scheduled worry time exercise for teenagers. CBT worry postponement technique to contain worries to specific time periods. Helps teens take control of when and how they worry. Teen-friendly anxiety management tool.

ocdThoughtLabeling.title: OCD Thought Labeling - Recognize Obsessions vs. Reality
ocdThoughtLabeling.description: OCD-specific thought labeling exercise. Learn to identify and label intrusive thoughts and obsessions. CBT technique to recognize thoughts are not facts. Helps reduce thought-action fusion in OCD.

compulsionDelay.title: Compulsion Delay Timer - ERP Technique for OCD
compulsionDelay.description: Timer-based compulsion delay exercise for OCD. Gradually delay compulsive behaviors using increasing intervals. Exposure Response Prevention (ERP) technique to build tolerance for anxiety and resist compulsions.

uncertaintyTolerance.title: Uncertainty Tolerance Exercises - Build Comfort with Not Knowing
uncertaintyTolerance.description: Guided exercises to build tolerance for uncertainty. Core component of OCD treatment. Practice sitting with uncertainty and accepting that you don't need to know everything. Helps reduce OCD symptoms.

ocdMindfulness.title: Mindfulness for Intrusive Thoughts - ACT-Based OCD Practice
ocdMindfulness.description: Mindfulness meditation adapted for OCD. Learn to observe intrusive thoughts without engaging with them. ACT-based approach to develop a different relationship with thoughts. Helps manage OCD symptoms.

nauseaManagement.title: Nausea Management - Breathing and Grounding for Emetophobia
nauseaManagement.description: Breathing and grounding techniques for nausea sensations. Helps distinguish between anxiety-induced nausea and actual physical nausea. CBT techniques for somatic anxiety in emetophobia.

sensationLabeling.title: Body Sensation Labeling - Distinguish Anxiety from Nausea
sensationLabeling.description: Cognitive technique to identify and label body sensations. Helps distinguish between anxiety-induced physical symptoms and actual nausea. Interoceptive exposure for emetophobia. Reduces fear around physical sensations.

safeFoodsVisualization.title: Safe Foods Visualization - Build Confidence Around Eating
safeFoodsVisualization.description: Guided visualization exercise for emetophobia. Build confidence around eating and food through guided imagery. Visualization techniques for phobia treatment. Helps reduce anxiety around food and eating situations.

copingCards.title: Coping Cards - Personalized Coping Strategies
copingCards.description: Create and use personalized coping cards with strategies, affirmations, and reminders. Works for all anxiety conditions. Store coping strategies for difficult moments. Access your cards anytime you need support.

testAnxietyReset.title: Test Anxiety Reset - Quick Calm Technique for Exams
testAnxietyReset.description: Quick 2-3 minute technique to calm test anxiety before or during exams. Breathing, thought reframing, and grounding for students. Teen-friendly test anxiety management.

socialAnxietyGrounding.title: Social Anxiety Grounding - Calm Technique for Social Situations
socialAnxietyGrounding.description: Quick grounding technique for social anxiety. Helpful for parties, presentations, and group settings. Subtle techniques you can use discreetly. Teen-friendly social anxiety management.

performanceAnxietyPrep.title: Performance Anxiety Prep - Pre-Performance Routine for Teens
performanceAnxietyPrep.description: Quick pre-performance routine for presentations, performances, and public speaking. Breathing, visualization, and power poses to boost confidence. Teen-friendly performance anxiety management.

interactiveArt.title: Interactive Art Therapy - Creative Drawing Tool for Anxiety
interactiveArt.description: Interactive art therapy tool with symmetric pattern drawing. Create beautiful flowing patterns to reduce anxiety and stress. Evidence-based creative expression for anxiety management.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Anxiety Aid Tools
privacy.description: Privacy policy for Anxiety Aid Tools. Learn how we protect your data with minimal analytics and local-only storage.

terms.title: Terms of Service - Anxiety Aid Tools
terms.description: Terms of service for Anxiety Aid Tools. Open source GPL licensed anxiety management application.

support.title: Support - Anxiety Aid Tools
support.description: Get help with Anxiety Aid Tools. FAQ, contact information, and troubleshooting for our anxiety management app.
